section.p: ‘It is fortunate we have a Chosen One of Maka at this temple,’ says the high priestess. ‘Only the Chosen Ones have the goddess-given powers to cure the afflicted!’

It costs 75 Shards - only 30 if you are an initiate of Maka - to be cured of a poison or a disease.
Make any necessary payment and
delete the disease or poison
, and its effects, from your Adventure Sheet.
.
